title: Super Farming Boy Demo

longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# An arcade-puzzle farming sim with chain reactions and combos
<!--text-->
Super Farming Boy™ is an exciting mix of ACTION, PUZZLE, and FARMING SIM, heavily relying on CHAIN REACTIONS and COMBOS.        

**Story**
In Super Farming Boy™, you play as Super, whose mom and friends have been captured by your evil nemesis, KORPO®©TM, who unlawfully hires you to work on your own land, taxing all proceeds for himself! Now, with your friends and mom up for sale, you must harvest your way through challenging adventures, saving enough to buy your mom and friends back!

**Gameplay Mechanics**
In Super Farming Boy™, there are no tools because you are the tool. With the simple push of a button, you can transform into a shovel, a hammer, a pickaxe, a watering can, and more! Super Farming Boy™ can even FLY! The game's central mechanic revolves around chain reactions and combos. The magical seed creatures in this world, once harvested, trigger specific chain-reaction effects that enable you to optimize your farm in ways never seen before in a farming game. These chain reaction and combo powers also serve as your means of defense against creatures, help optimize your daily stamina usage, and facilitate various actions such as chopping down trees, demolishing boulders, removing weeds, collecting items, defeating bosses, and much more! Explore whimsical weathers and extraordinarily unusual seasons, such as Radioactive Season, Timewarp Season, and Volcanic Season. There's even a season set underwater! Super Farming Boy™ has been meticulously designed with touch controls in mind. The gameplay is incredibly intuitive: everything is drag-and-droppable and supports both classic joystick controllers (XBOX, Bluetooth, PS, Joycon, Switch Pro Controllers), keyboard, and touch simultaneously!

**Features**

**- Superhero abilities**

Super Farming Boy™ has the ability to walk, run, and even fly! Additionally, he can transform into any tool with a simple push or tap of a button—be it a shovel, pickaxe, axe, or hammer, and more!

**- Chain reaction and combos**

Optimize your farm by harvesting a single crop and witnessing the chain and combo effects efficiently harvest your entire farm at once. However, meticulous and strategic planning in your planting efforts is essential!

**- Unlock & upgrade supertools**

All SuperTools and powers in Super Farming Boy™ come in the form of old-school superhero trading cards. Unlock, collect and upgrade them all!

**- Unusual seasons to discover**

Explore a plethora of seasons in Super Farming Boy™, including Spring, Winteria, Volcanic, Radioactive, Underwater (coming soon), and Timewarp (coming soon).

**- Idle helpers to collect**

Rescue all your friend-pets by purchasing them back from Korpo™®©! Each pet comes with a unique idle mechanic to help automate your farm, like auto-watering, auto-hammering, and more.

**- No inventory management**

Super Farming Boy™ eliminates the need for inventory management. All seeds and idle helpers are creatures that follow you around wherever you go, avoiding the hassle of an ever-filling inventory!

Beauty up and customize it all
Personalize your BlobHouse with fantastic beauty items such as bedside tables, rugs, and beds! Your home will be uniquely yours and look amazing with your creative touch.

**- Boss fights... in a farming game?**

Utilize your crops' combo and chain reaction powers to defend your farm against evil creatures like pests and seasonal bosses!

**- Mushroom boosters**

Discover all the crazy Mushroom Booster power-ups scattered through the land, which provide instant effects, such as Daylight during the night, Instant Weather changes, or UltraTool transformations (like a huge hammers) and more mysterious effects. Mix and combine them to see what happens!

**- Touch controls that are actually good**

Enjoy very intuitive touch controls—drag and drop every item in the game! Including NPCs, seeds, idle helpers, and Super Farming Boy™ himself!. Alternatively, play with your favorite XBOX/PS or Bluetooth controller. You can use both controls at the same time if you want.
